ai-thig6.6:1.1_0: Oh Buddha, my hero: homage to you!
ai-thig6.6:1.4_0: and many other beings as well.
ai-thig6.6:2.1_0: who has completely understood all suffering.
ai-thig6.6:2.3_0: the eightfold path has been developed;
ai-thig6.6:2.4_0: and cessation has been realized by me.
ai-thig6.6:3.1_0: Previously I was a mother, a son,
ai-thig6.6:3.2_0: a father, a brother, and a grandmother.
ai-thig6.6:3.3_0: Failing to grasp the true nature of things,
ai-thig6.6:4.1_0: For I have seen the Blessed One,
ai-thig6.6:4.2_0: this bag of bones is their last.
ai-thig6.6:4.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-thig6.6:5.1_0: I see the disciples in harmony,
ai-thig6.6:5.4_0: this was said by the Buddha,
ai-thig6.6:6.1_0: A wise person living at home
ai-thig6.6:6.2_0: that Māyā gave birth to Gotama.
ai-thig6.6:6.3_0: He swept away the mass of suffering
ai-thig6.6:6.4_0: for those stricken by sickness and death.
